title: Good Code
alt: You can either hang out in the Android Loop or the HURD loop.
transcript:
[The comic is a flowchart In order to explain this in text, follow the line numbers. Options follow on new lines without numbers.]
How to write good code.
[10.] Start Project. [Go to 20.][20.] Do things right or do them fast?
Fast [Go to 30.]
Right [Go to 40.][30.] Code fast. [Go to 35.][35.] Does it work yet? 
No [Go to 30.]
Almost, but it's become a mass of kludges and spaghetti code. [Go to 50.][40.] Code well. [Go to 45.][45.] Are you done yet?
No. [Go to 40.]
No, and the requirements have changed. [Go to 50.][50.] Throw it all out and start over. [Go to 10.][60.]Â ? [Go to 70.][70.] Good code.
